channel.title: Error could not find or load main class
channel.description:
I've searched this so much and couldn't find anything that worked.
I'm on Windows 7 64bit, and here is my Client run.bat [code]@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause
[/code]
Will +Rep if it works.
Here is the exact error message [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2lln9lv.png[/img]

item.title: Error could not find or load main class
item.dc:creator: @panic2 panic2
item.description:
@panic2 wrote:

I’ve searched this so much and couldn’t find anything that worked.

I’m on Windows 7 64bit, and here is my Client run.bat

[code]@echo off
title Client
cd ./Class/
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
pause

[/code]

Will +Rep if it works.

Here is the exact error message
